scripts.version-update-w: git checkout -B version-inc && npm --no-git-tag-version version %CURR_VERSION_CMD% && git add package.json && git commit -m "Version Inc NPM" && bower --offline version %CURR_VERSION_CMD% && git push origin version-inc && npm run version-merge-w
scripts.version-merge-w: git checkout develop && git merge --no-ff version-inc && git push origin develop && git branch -D version-inc && git push origin :version-inc && git tag -d v%npm_package_version% && git fetch origin && git checkout master && git merge --no-ff develop && git push origin master && git tag %npm_package_version% && git push origin %npm_package_version%
scripts.version-update-b: git checkout -B version-inc && npm --no-git-tag-version version $CURR_VERSION_CMD && git add package.json && git commit -m "Version Inc NPM" && bower --offline version $CURR_VERSION_CMD && git push origin version-inc && npm run version-merge-b
scripts.version-merge-b: git checkout develop && git merge --no-ff version-inc && git push origin develop && git branch -D version-inc && git push origin :version-inc && git tag -d v$npm_package_version && git fetch origin && git checkout master && git merge --no-ff develop && git push origin master && git tag $npm_package_version && git push origin $npm_package_version
